message_1: What is the balanced half equation for the reduction of dichromate ion (Cr2O7 2-) to chromium (III) ion (Cr3+) in an acidic solution?
message_2:
The balanced half equation for the reduction of dichromate ion (Cr2O7 2-) to chromium (III) ion (Cr3+) in an acidic solution is:

Cr2O7 2- + 14H+ + 6e- â†’ 2Cr3+ + 7H2O
